title: Flipped Learning-Based Customized Social Curriculum Design for Learning Styles

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Blended Learning Environment Combining Flipped Learning and Project-Based Learning for Social Studies Competency Enhancement Programs for Office Workers

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans in flipped learning environments
Learners can diagnose their learning styles (active/reflective) and apply personalized learning strategies
Learners can engage in social interaction with peer learners using collaborative tools at least three times.
Learners can systematically propose solutions to social problems through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
